data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: My grandparents got married in a hurry at the court. They ____ out ____ papers ____ 4:50 PM, ____ minutes ____ the ____ closed! Their ____ was ____ to ____ the ____. After the wedding, they went on vacation for two weeks.
data.partBlankContent: My grandparents got married in a hurry at the court. They fil___ out t__ papers a_ 4:50 PM, t__ minutes bef___ the co___ closed! Their fri___ was th___ to wa___ the cere____. After the wedding, they went on vacation for two weeks.
data.answer: 我的祖父母在宫廷匆匆结婚。他们在下午4:50填写了这些文件，就在法庭关闭的前几分钟!他们的朋友在那里观看了仪式。婚礼后，他们去度假两个星期。
